<!-- overview:start -->

## Overview

Creates a ZIP archive of all brand logos

<!-- overview:end -->
<!-- usage:start -->

## Usage

```yaml
- uses: hoverkraft-tech/landing-page/.github/actions/create-logo-pack@c83355f5e435231ea4abbc2364aedeba97e58741 # 2.2.1
  with:
    # Directory containing logos
    # This input is required.
    logos-dir: ""

    # Output ZIP file path
    # This input is required.
    output-file: ""
```

<!-- usage:end -->
<!-- inputs:start -->

## Inputs

| **Input**         | **Description**            | **Required** | **Default** |
| ----------------- | -------------------------- | ------------ | ----------- |
| **`logos-dir`**   | Directory containing logos | **true**     | -           |
| **`output-file`** | Output ZIP file path       | **true**     | -           |
